text: Richard Lloyd George (born May 22, 1953 in Fillmore, Utah) is an American javelin athlete. He represented his country at the 1976 Summer Olympics. ==Education== George went to Brigham Young University, earning a BA in Economics and Harvard Business School, earning an MBA. ==Career== He served as Vice President of Southern Virginia University. He was CEO of General Resonance LLC and Clene NanoMedicine Inc. ==Personal== He married the late Jennifer Geer (1976 to 2015). They had six children. He later married Ann Peterson Tempest in 2018. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:American male javelin throwers Category:Olympic track and field athletes of the United States Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1976 Summer Olympics Category:People from Fillmore, Utah Category:Track and field athletes from Utah Category:Brigham Young University alumni Category:Harvard Business School alumni Category:Southern Virginia University people Category:American chief executives Category:American chief financial officers
title: Richard George (athlete)
